A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Right up with Empire as the best in the saga! It's new\, unknown\, and fresh and that makes it terrifying to longtime Star Wars fans like me\, and because of that\, Star Wars is awesome again. Who cares that Snoke isn't the big bad like the Emperor\, and Luke the uncompromising good like Yoda/Obi-Wan in the original trilogy. For the first time\, the sides aren't black and white\, and we have no idea what is coming next. It's awesome. Forget the bad reviews and make an opinion yourself.
